lines.text: Kenner, just in case we get killed, I wanted to tell you, you have the biggest dick I've ever seen on a man.

[nods]
Thanks. I don't know what to say.
How about "Don't get killed"?
Don't get killed.
You too.
We've got a problem here. There are more bad guys than we've got bullets.
You have the right to be dead.
Ya know, it's kinda like one of those video games... you just defeated the first wave.
Do you know you have moments when you're truly an asshole?
Hey, she was frightened.
Yeah, I saw you strip down for that hot tub. I'd be frightened, too...
Cop. Policeman, Understand? It's bad to shoot me. He's a cop too. It's bad to shoot him.
Let's get the fuck out of here.
You are dead!
Hell sucked! We are back!
[Kenner is aiming a gun at the main bad guy]
Well? Are you gonna kill him?
Not right now... Maybe later.
[Kenner says some words in Japanese]
What did that mean?
Roughly translated, out of the frying pan and boned up the ass with a red-hot poker.
There you have it.
I liked that car. And I liked that girl. And I'd like to cut off certain parts of Yoshida's anatomy.
Ya know, you've got a fixation, pal...
Listen, will you do this right? Clean? Like a cop in the 20th century, not some samurai warrior? We're gonna nail this guy. And when we get done... we're gonna go eat fish off those naked chicks!

[Jonny beats up some guys to let Kenner through]
How long did you study?
Since I was four.
Should've started earlier. That would've helped your form.
I was four! There's nothing wrong with my form.
This is a nice place.
I built it.

[sees Japanese businessmen eating sushi off of a naked woman]
You know that thing I said about the fish? I can change my mind...
You know all of that upper body strength really slows you down.
I'm not slow.
You didn't hit me.
If I did, you wouldn't be here.
Not arguing. But you didn't...
I wanted to work in Malibu.
That'll never happen.
Thanks, that's supportive. I've joined you on this quest for personal vengeance and you've got to take a shot at my dreams?
Malibu's Sheriff's Department, not LAPD.
Really? Damn.
[last lines]
What are we going to call this in the police report?
How about "community relations"?
We blew up the crime scene, killed the suspects...
...and joined the local parade.
I like it!

[they've been partners less than a day]
Look, I'm gonna call your chief, tell him it's not working out, and send you back to wherever it is you came from.
Don't do that. They really don't want me back. I have a problem keeping partners too.
I can see why. I hate you already.
Now you only have one hand with which to wipe your ass with,do you want to keep the other one?.
[laughs]
What?
That time I heard you coming!
the asshole found us first.
So shall we get down and kick some ass?
No. I'm gonna enjoy being dead for a while.
This is for my parents.

[to Kenner]
Listen you Zen warrior, fucking samurai asshole! I wanna know what's up!

[about to enter the Bansai Club]
I'm warning you, I don't eat raw fish. But that's just me.
We do this right. Like a cop in the 20th century and not some warrior, we're gonna get this guy. And when we're done we're gonna go eat fish off those naked chicks!
There's nothing wrong with my form!
That's perfect... I'm partnered with a homicidal maniac on a personal vendetta of family vengeance.

[Opens up a beer bottle which pours out pills of some kind]
Now, America can enjoy our beer *and* our drugs while watching football.
How American! The backseat, the movies, the beautiful girl... You know what's missing? Popcorn.
